short_summary: Supply and Install of Audio-Visual Equipment for a Multimedia Recording Studio
description: The RCMP wants to acquire and install audio-visual equipment for a multimedia recording studio at Leikin Drive, Ottawa by December 31, 2023. A mandatory site visit is scheduled for May 17, 2023.
full_summary:
======================================

### Request for Proposal: Multimedia Studio Fit-Up

**Tender Notice ID:** [Refer to Attachment for the Unique ID]
**Title (English):** Request for Proposal: Multimedia Studio Fit-Up
**Title (French):** Demande de propositions : Aménagement de studio multi-média
**Publication Date:** April 25, 2023
**Closing Date:** July 25, 2023 (14:00:00)

**Summary:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for the Supply and Installation of Audio-Visual Equipment for a Multimedia Recording Studio at Leikin Drive, Ottawa, with a target completion date by December 31, 2023. The procurement is an open bidding process.

**Key Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **UNSPSC Code:** 52161500 (Audio and visual equipment)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR), and all regions of Canada
* **End-User:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Contractor Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec

**Tender Requirements:**

* A mandatory site visit will be held on May 17, 2023
* All submissions should be made electronically through the [linked page in attachment]

**Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Important Dates:**

* Amendment Date: July 5, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 25, 2023

**Contact Information:**

* Louie Turner (Buyer)
  Telephone: Not Available
  Email: [louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  Address: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec 

### Critical Notice:

Please note that all deadlines and dates specified in the tender document are final and take precedence over any other schedules. It is the responsibility of the bidders to verify all dates and submit their bids on time. 

**References:**

Please see the official RFP document on [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16094729?extsite=MTYwOTQ3M
